channel.title: Deceived by girlman and other raiders
channel.description:
ok. so i was on in the process of moving from the UE to a new plot of land 1000's of blocks away from spawn. this person i dont even remember his name it was like jop something or other. said he was new so i said he could stay with me if he want. so he followed me to the new spot where i was going to make my city.
i let him have stuff like my watch and i made him a map. i get on today and guess what every single valuable thing i had is gone. 3 blocks of diamond that i just mined, couple blocks of gold, 20 some blocks of iron, 3 stacks of bricks.... all our diamond tools. the list goes on. girlman and xvizard raided us. and it wouldnt have been possible if that noob wouldnt have lead them to us. idk if the noob was girlman on a second account or a friend of one of the ppl that raided me and my friends.
none of our chest were locked b/c we were still in the process of moving from our old location.
call me an idiot for letting someone follow me but im a nice person and anyone i will treat nice, and trust them until they give me a reason to not be nice, or to trust them.
im nice enough if anyone needed something all they would have to do is ask for something and i would give it to them but no its a hell of a lot bet just to steal from me...
idk im just upset enough im feeling like leaving this server. i would like to know if this jop person had any affiliation to girlman and xvizard. and if he was one of them or a friend of theirs i find it extremely unhonorable that they would take advantage of my kindness, and generosity to steal from me. to me stealing should be on the same level as greifing.
i definitely cant wait for the new plugin thats all i can say.

item.title: Deceived by girlman and other raiders
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar_X Mr Mopar X
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar_X wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:32, topic:401089”][quote author=xx matty xx link=topic=498146.msg3644396#msg3644396 date=1309271178]

One thing I don’t like is that when you type it, it’s there for anyone looking over your shoulder to see If it was just your MC password, then all they could do is get on your account, but as it’s our forum passwords they could do anything…

So far it hasn’t been that much of a problem for me (I just cover the screen ;)) but maybe that’s what Frell is talking about…

I never really thought of that, does anyone actually play minecraft in public places?

I’ve played it in front of people at uni and at home family members can see what I’m doing. It’s been fine for me because these people don’t know which server I’m actually playing, but I can see it being a problem for others (inb4 my brother hacked my account etc).
[/quote]cough the Mr Mopars /cough

But yea I also play it in front of my brother and sometimes my dad/friends, but like I said I just consciously remember to cover the screen :)[/quote]

Cough I keep my account secure so it will never happen Cough

Read full topic
item.source: Deceived by girlman and other raiders

It’s been fine for me because these people don’t know which server I’m actually playing, but I can see it being a problem for others (inb4 my brother hacked my account etc).[/quote]cough the Mr Mopars /cough

I’ve played it in front of people at uni and at home family members can see what I’m doing. It’s been fine for me because these people don’t know which server I’m actually playing, but I can see it being a problem for others (inb4 my brother hacked my account etc).

item.title: Deceived by girlman and other raiders
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:24, topic:401089”]One thing I don’t like is that when you type it, it’s there for anyone looking over your shoulder to see If it was just your MC password, then all they could do is get on your account, but as it’s our forum passwords they could do anything…

So far it hasn’t been that much of a problem for me (I just cover the screen ;)) but maybe that’s what Frell is talking about…[/quote]

I never really thought of that, does anyone actually play minecraft in public places?

[quote=“Frell, post:25, topic:401089”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=498146.msg3643996#msg3643996 date=1309229175]

Out of curiosity, how do you think the new plugin would have helped you with this? Since you can only protect 1 place at a time, the same thing would have happened, right?

b/c that place would have been protected. and the old place wouldnt have been.

Then why wasn’t that chest protected, and the old chest wasn’t? Same thing, is it not?

Out of curiosity, how do you think the new plugin would have helped you with this? Since you can only protect 1 place at a time, the same thing would have happened, right?

Is it possible to automatically whitelist junior+ members on the forums and allow them to have up to 3 locked chests?

And while you’re at it, add a field called “Minecraft password” in our profiles. I do not feel secure at all typing my forum password openly in minecraft like that.

So people spam on the forums before they grief? No thanks. Also, the chest locking plugin is going away in favor of residence.

I would agree with you if I didn’t run the minecraft server on the same box as the forum, what could possibly be not secure about it? (unless you log onto the wrong server or something)
[/quote]
I worry I may forget the slash or something and everyone will see “login pancake91210”[/quote]
Try it and see what happens, nothing will.

Read full topic
item.source: Deceived by girlman and other raiders

item.title: Deceived by girlman and other raiders
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:13, topic:401089”][quote author=zuppers link=topic=498146.msg3642832#msg3642832 date=1309141348]

[quote author=xryz link=topic=498146.msg3642829#msg3642829 date=1309141225]
ok. well i didnt put the chests up. my cousin said they were hidden then later i told him no they werent. my cousin thought stealing was against the rules. could u ask him if he would give some stuff back? those stacks of bricks were for my house they were from my old house and if had those bricks since the beginning of this server map. also the diamond tools would be nice to have back, if not he can add me to his list of enemies.
[/quote]I think girlman gave the stuff to xx matty xx tho I’m not sure. I should have enough stuff to give you everything you lost back. I’ll just have to be more careful when leading people to my place.
[/quote]I wondered what all that was about. He gave me a compass (which I gave back because I wouldn’t use it), 2 diamonds and like 20 iron ore. Maybe he’s been distributing the stuff to different people?[/quote]

You turned away items? tut, you’re loosing it Matt. Anyway, you know why girlman was giving you items. He usually gives them to me but I wasn’t on.

Read full topic
item.source: Deceived by girlman and other raiders

item.title: Deceived by girlman and other raiders
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:16, topic:401089”][quote author=whattehp406 link=topic=498146.msg3643196#msg3643196 date=1309176762]

[quote author=Frell link=topic=498146.msg3643151#msg3643151 date=1309173861]

Out of curiosity, how do you think the new plugin would have helped you with this? Since you can only protect 1 place at a time, the same thing would have happened, right?

Is it possible to automatically whitelist junior+ members on the forums and allow them to have up to 3 locked chests?

And while you’re at it, add a field called “Minecraft password” in our profiles. I do not feel secure at all typing my forum password openly in minecraft like that.
[/quote]I support! Having only Junior+ members will geatly decrease random persons who want to grief, they will need to be part of the community first, or a whitelist ofc.
[/quote]I support this too, especially as the server doesn’t require you to have a minecraft account. Moparisthebest doesn’t seem to like the idea of any sort of whitelist though, maybe because it decreases player count and that is bad?! Having 5 honest players is much better than having 20 players of which 5 are just here to troll everyone.[/quote]

support for this
